value:
Legendary Hero? Well, in my world,
we do tell tales of heroes from days
gone by.$k$pThat's the kind of thing you're talking
about, right?

My father taught me everything about
swordsmanship. He also taught the
man who turned out to be his rival...$k$pWe both did all we could to master
his style of fighting.

People aren't perfect. We all make
mistakes. But we also love our
families and our friends...$k$pWe should never forget that we all
have that same capacity for love.

Time and again, I've fought when the
chances of winning were slim.$k$pThese were not battles where I
weighed whether or not I could win.
They were battles I had to fight.

I'll repeat something I was told, once...$k$p"You should challenge your fates.
When all else fails, you can still die
fighting."

I'm Ike, and I've brought you a
message of friendship straight from
$Nf.

One day, I'll be able to match my
father's skill with a sword when he
was at his peak.

Fighting a strong rival is better
than any training.

Ups and downs don't bother me.
I'll get there.

I have my sights set on a goal,
and now I'm closer to it. Thanks.

I'm Ike, of the Greil Mercenaries. I'm
not so sure about this "Legendary
Hero" business, but I'll help you out.

It's always the same. No matter the
era, no matter the world... War.
The fighting never ends.$k$pYou fight to make peace. And it may
seem like that battle will never end...
That it's out of your reach.$k$pDon't get discouraged. Your feelings
are what drive you. Your actions have
purpose.$k$pNo matter how hard things get, you
have to keep fighting. I know that
you'll press on. I respect that.$k$pLet me walk your road with you. Once
I get started, I don't give in. I'll stay by
your side until the end, if you'll let me.
はぁっ！
むぅんっ！
うああっ！
やるな…
I won't have mercy on my enemies.
End of the line.
I'll strike you down with one blow.
There's no stopping me.
I...admit defeat.
ははっ
I'm Ike. One thing led to another, and now I'm a general.
Hm? You want to train with me? OK.
I've met a lot of people. Not many are as odd as you, though.
I've had pain, I've had suffering, and I have gotten up and moved on.
I'm not much for politics. I live by my principles, my sword, and my friends.
The Black Knight... He was my father's killer. And my last teacher.
As long as I'm here, I won't let you die. There's too much riding on your survival. Stay close.
Let's move.
What next?
I won't lose.
